name: Penguins gon' fly
description:
The penguins have had enough.

The birds will no longer make fun of them for not flying.

Only bad thing is, you're a bird.

Run.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys

Left shift to fly faster


I'll be updating this game a few more times to add extra features!

Make sure to come back and check it out

To-do list:

Esc for pause

Sound effects

Death effect

The shield taking down enemy planes
